page.title: 16HIGHWOOD PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: Highwood Parish Council is the first tier of{local government}for part of this survey area.Seven local people meet every other month to talk about problems.They have no real power but give advice and think of themselves as the{local watchdog.}These are 2 issues concerning them at the moment. The bins in the lay-bys on the A414 have paper liners.After busy weekends or in wet weather they overfill and split encouraging rats and looking un- sightly.The Borough Council say they can't afford to empty them more than once a week.The County Council won't supply larger bins.The Parish Council keep pressing for action. The Parish Council are worried that when{Stansted Airport}is developed,the {Green Belt}restrictions on building permission may be overruled.The Coun- cil would fight this very forcefully.
